nttcp, which is due to be installed in the Debian FTP archive:

  to pool/non-free/n/nttcp/nttcp_1.47-11.diff.gz

  to pool/non-free/n/nttcp/nttcp_1.47-11_amd64.deb

attached.

have further comments please address them to 455986@bugs.debian.org,
and the maintainer will reopen the bug report if appropriate.

Debian distribution maintenance software

Taku YASUI <tach@debian.or.jp> (supplier of updated nttcp package)

believe that there is a problem with it please contact the archive
administrators by mailing ftpmaster@debian.org)
